name: Hazy Gun
author: christefanu
notes: After Ninjas brang me to legend3 and tilted me back to legend1 with only monster brick hands vs ca I decided to give 3SD Hazy a try and Iiterally destroyed my opponents and got fast wins. Score was like 18-3 definitely credit to BuiltToTilt. Many opponents tried to attack Hazy when theres no backrow like br so i teched WOD (for ca and mirror) since AG were rare for me
